Package org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class ExpressedConditionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.ExpressedConditionRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class ExpressedConditionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a record of conditions expressed by a person, including onset and end times, and associated symptoms.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ExpressedConditionRecord.ConditionPeriod
      this class contains basic info regarding an expressed conditions.
      class  ExpressedConditionRecord.ConditionWithSymptoms
      Represents a condition with its associated symptoms.
      class  ExpressedConditionRecord.ModuleConditions
      Used to record condition onset by modules.
      class  ExpressedConditionRecord.OnsetCondition
      Represents a condition with a set of onset and end time entries.

      • getConditionFromState

        public java.lang.String getConditionFromState​(java.lang.String module,
                                              java.lang.String state)
        Method for retrieving the condition name from a state name. Useful when dealing with ConditionEnd.conditionOnSet attribute.
        Parameters:
        module - the module name
        state - the state name
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        time - the time the condition ended

      • getConditionSymptoms

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​java.util.List<ExpressedConditionRecord.ConditionWithSymptoms>> getConditionSymptoms()
        Get the symptoms that were expressed as parts of the conditions the person suffers from. The returned data is a map of [time: List of ConditionWithSymtoms]. It captures the conditions a person has suffered from together with the related symptoms at different age/time.
        Returns:
        a map of time to a list of conditions with symptoms
